headline: Better Passive Income Stock: Verizon vs. AT&T
summary: Which is the better passive income stock right now?  Add to that the hefty $2.71 annual dividend -- representing a yield of roughly 6.8% -- and investors in Verizon banked a total return of nearly 13%.

headline: Lessons I've Learned From Writing 5,000 Articles For Seeking Alpha
summary: Writing for Seeking Alpha is a continuous but opportunistic learning curve. Read more about becoming a contributor to his crowdsourced, investing-focused platform.
